Name: Mains power
Description: Mains power systems vary between regions and countries. This type is used to note the voltage, current, and power socket types in use in a certain region.

Properties.Name: AC Frequency
Properties.Description: The nominal frequency at which the AC current is supplied in this system

Properties.Name: Location
Properties.Description: The region or country of use of this system. Each country's system should be in a different entry

Properties.Name: Nominal system voltage
Properties.Description: The voltage used in this system. If two voltage are stated for a country, this means that two systems are in use.  The other system goes in separate entry for Mains power systems.
